title: First class, generic properties (see Rx) and use of first class observable events (IObservable).
body: It's a pity that WPF's property and event systems are island in the middle of a bunch of other great runtime-level and library-level enhancements to key concepts like generic properties and observable events. The snippets required for DPs and such are the best testimonials of this archeology.

comments.body: It would be fantastic if WPF's binding and designer both took advantage of this too.  Composite observable properties would become so much nicer to write.
